content.metaTitle: Villa Thalassa Jávea: €2.1M Luxury 4-Bed Sea View Villa
content.metaDescription: Exceptional 4-bedroom villa in Balcón al Mar, Jávea with panoramic sea views to Ibiza. 1000m² plot, pool, luxury finishes. Completion 2026. €2,095,000
content.heroIntro:
Discover Villa Thalassa, an extraordinary Mediterranean sanctuary being meticulously refurbished to the highest standards in the prestigious Balcón al Mar enclave of Jávea. This south-facing luxury villa commands a prime 1,000 m² elevated plot, offering breathtaking panoramic views across the azure Mediterranean Sea stretching all the way to Ibiza.

Combining timeless Mediterranean architecture with contemporary luxury, Villa Thalassa represents the pinnacle of Costa Blanca living. Every detail has been carefully considered by renowned developer Miralbo Urbana, creating a sophisticated retreat where expansive glass walls dissolve the boundaries between indoor and outdoor living, flooding the interiors with natural light while showcasing the spectacular coastal vistas that define this exceptional property.

locationSection.intro:
Nestled in the tranquil and exclusive Balcón al Mar area of Jávea, Villa Thalassa occupies one of the Costa Blanca's most coveted locations. This elevated position provides unobstructed views across the Mediterranean while maintaining the privacy and serenity that discerning buyers seek. The area is renowned for its sophisticated residential character, with luxury villas dotting the hillside among Mediterranean pine forests and native vegetation.

Jávea itself is considered the jewel of the Costa Blanca, where dramatic cliff-top locations meet pristine beaches and crystal-clear waters. The town has successfully maintained its authentic Spanish charm while offering world-class amenities, making it a magnet for international buyers seeking the perfect balance of natural beauty, cultural richness, and modern convenience.
highlights: Minutes from Jávea's most beautiful beaches including Playa del Arenal and secluded coves
Panoramic sea views extending to Ibiza on clear days
Exclusive Balcón al Mar residential area known for luxury properties
Easy access to Jávea town center with restaurants, shopping, and marina
1 hour from Valencia airport, 1.5 hours from Alicante airport

propertyFeatures.intro: Villa Thalassa showcases the finest in contemporary Mediterranean design, where every element has been selected to enhance the luxury living experience. The comprehensive refurbishment by Miralbo Urbana ensures that modern comfort seamlessly integrates with the villa's inherent Mediterranean character.
features: 4 spacious bedrooms including master suite with private terrace
4 luxury bathrooms with high-end fixtures and finishes
Open-plan living spaces with floor-to-ceiling windows
Panoramic sea views from main living areas and master bedroom
Private swimming pool with Mediterranean landscaping
Covered terraces and shaded pergolas for outdoor dining
1,000 m² private plot with mature Mediterranean gardens
South-facing orientation ensuring optimal natural light
High-end finishes throughout including premium materials
Fully landscaped grounds with native plants and privacy screening

content.investmentSection:
Villa Thalassa represents an exceptional investment opportunity in one of Spain's most desirable coastal markets. Jávea's property market has demonstrated remarkable resilience and growth, driven by its limited supply of premium properties and consistent international demand. The combination of the exclusive Balcón al Mar location, panoramic sea views, and the reputation of developer Miralbo Urbana positions this villa for strong capital appreciation.

The luxury rental market in Jávea continues to thrive, with properties of this caliber commanding premium rates throughout the year. The villa's completion in February 2026 means buyers can benefit from contemporary building standards and energy efficiency while the Costa Blanca market continues its upward trajectory. With Spain's Golden Visa program and favorable tax structures for EU residents, international buyers will find additional investment advantages in this remarkable property.
whyBuySection: Unobstructed panoramic sea views extending to Ibiza from an elevated 1,000 m² plot
Complete luxury refurbishment by prestigious developer Miralbo Urbana to the highest standards
Prime Balcón al Mar location in exclusive Jávea, one of Costa Blanca's most sought-after areas
Ready-to-move-in February 2026 with no additional work required
Strong investment potential in a proven luxury market with excellent rental yields
South-facing orientation ensuring optimal natural light and Mediterranean climate enjoyment
Walking distance to Jávea's pristine beaches, restaurants, and cultural amenities

faqs.question: What is the total price and what payment terms are available?
faqs.answer: Villa Thalassa is priced at €2,095,000. We can arrange flexible payment schedules and provide information about Spanish mortgage options through our partner network, including non-resident financing up to 70% of the property value.

faqs.question: When will Villa Thalassa be completed and ready for occupancy?
faqs.answer: The comprehensive refurbishment is scheduled for completion in February 2026. The villa will be delivered fully finished, landscaped, and ready to enjoy immediately upon completion.

faqs.question: What is included in the purchase price?
faqs.answer: The price includes the complete luxury refurbishment, all high-end fixtures and fittings, the private swimming pool, full Mediterranean landscaping, covered terraces, and pergolas. The villa will be delivered turnkey ready.

faqs.question: How do I arrange a viewing of the property?
faqs.answer: You can schedule a viewing by contacting us on WhatsApp at the provided link, calling +34 634 044 970, or through our website. We offer both in-person and virtual viewing options for international buyers.

faqs.question: What are the mortgage options for international buyers?
faqs.answer: Spanish banks typically offer mortgages up to 70% of the property value for non-residents. We work with Habeno mortgage specialists who can arrange competitive financing solutions. Visit our Habeno partner link for a preliminary assessment.

faqs.question: What is the rental potential for this property?
faqs.answer: Luxury villas in Balcón al Mar with sea views command premium rental rates. Properties of this caliber typically achieve €3,000-5,000 per week during peak season, with strong year-round demand from affluent travelers seeking exclusive accommodations.

faqs.question: What makes the Balcón al Mar location special?
faqs.answer: Balcón al Mar is one of Jávea's most exclusive residential areas, offering privacy, luxury properties, and unobstructed sea views. It's minutes from beautiful beaches while maintaining a tranquil, upscale atmosphere away from tourist crowds.

faqs.question: What is the buying process for international purchasers?
faqs.answer: The process involves obtaining an NIE number, opening a Spanish bank account, property surveys, and completing the purchase through a notary. We guide international buyers through each step and can recommend experienced English-speaking lawyers and tax advisors.

faqs.question: Are there any additional costs beyond the purchase price?
faqs.answer: Additional costs typically include Spanish property transfer tax (6-10%), notary fees, legal fees, and registration costs. Total additional costs usually range from 10-12% of the purchase price. We provide detailed cost breakdowns during the initial consultation.

faqs.question: What are the nearby amenities and transport connections?
faqs.answer: Jávea offers excellent restaurants, beaches, golf courses, and marina facilities within minutes. Valencia airport is 1 hour away, Alicante 1.5 hours, with regular flights to major European cities. The AP-7 motorway provides easy access to other Costa Blanca destinations.

content.conclusion: Villa Thalassa represents a rare opportunity to acquire a luxury Mediterranean villa in one of the Costa Blanca's most prestigious locations. With its panoramic sea views, premium finishes, and prime Balcón al Mar address, this property offers the perfect combination of investment potential and lifestyle excellence. Contact us today via WhatsApp or call +34 634 044 970 to arrange your exclusive viewing and discover why Villa Thalassa is destined to become your ultimate Mediterranean sanctuary.
